# Stephanie Hancock

### ![Stephanie Hancock](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_1881137/Image/City%20Hall/Mayor%20&%20City%20Council/Mayor%20and%20Council%20Member/2024/Stephanie-Hancock_2024.jpg "Stephanie Hancock")Ward IV

**303.739.7015** (council office)  
**Email:** [shancock@auroragov.org](mailto:shancock@auroragov.org)  
**Term Expires:** November 2027

**Council Policy Committees (2025):**  Chair, Transportation, Airports &amp; Public Works; Vice Chair, Public Safety, Courts &amp; Civil Service; Member, Federal, State &amp; Intergovernmental Relations

[View the City's Ward Map](https://auroraco.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=e4e6a71afc8d4f40b6e5f9309bc98f87 "View the City's Ward Map")
